item.description:
Original song arranging & jamming. Rehearsal of songs for Monday Open Mike. Generally, newcomers, intermediates and free style jamming starts at 2PM, and Rehearsal for Open mike around 3:00. Bring music sheets of your songs if possible. All musician levels welcome & encouraged. Lessons in theory or practice, music genres, or jamming if appropriate.

Directions will be emailed to attendees the night before or morning (by 10AM) of the meetup. If a lot of people RSVP we will extend time, so you can come late to stagger arrivals so each gets a chance to play your songs.
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be sent out to attendees the day before the meetup.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam / Open MIke Rehearsal
